name: EYES (yumaikas, GDeavid)
description:
SFX not yet added! They should be added by 12/16

(if you want, you could pretend it's a silent film, or you could come back to check it out after I've had a chance to add in the SFX)

J/Z attacks with your pipe  
K/X attacks with your whip
H/V activates floor panels
N/C throws bombs
Space jumps
A/D and Left/Right arrows move
W/S  and Up/Down arrows aim bombs up/down
